# @bundlenudge/builder

> Bundle builder for processing JavaScript bundles.

## Purpose

Service for validating uploaded bundles, generating incremental diffs, and preparing manifests for SDK consumption.

## Key Exports

- `processBundle()` - Main entry point
- `validateBundle()` - Validate bundle structure
- `generateDiff()` - Create binary diff
- `createManifest()` - Generate bundle manifest

## Usage

```typescript
import { processBundle } from '@bundlenudge/builder';

const result = await processBundle({
  newBundle: Buffer,
  oldBundle: Buffer | null,
});
// { manifest, diff, metadata }
```

## File Structure

```
src/
├── index.ts          # Exports
├── processor.ts      # Main logic
├── validator.ts      # Bundle validation
├── differ.ts         # Diff generation
├── manifest.ts       # Manifest creation
└── utils/
    ├── hash.ts
    └── compress.ts
```

## Code Conventions

- Max 250 lines per file
- Stream large files
- Validate all inputs
- Compress diffs
